snippet.title: Organs Please — New Teaser
snippet.description:
It's time to get off of this hunk of dying rock. HeroCraft PC is proud to present a new teaser trailer for Organs Please, a satirical management sim, where you take control of a recycling factory with a twist: you recycle humans. 

Wishlist Organs Please on Steam → https://bit.ly/OrPlEIS 

The video shows off what a typical work week is like for you, the factory's overseer. Players will need to screen the visitors desperately trying to get off the planet, manage the factory floor while constructing new facilities, hire staff with unique quirks, and juggle orders from competing factions in an increasingly frantic environment.
